title: AHP-PSO-Based Instructional Design for Optimizing Music Education Objective Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational music theory and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course for analyzing and optimizing higher-education-level music education goal systems.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the hierarchical structure of the 4D 18-metric music education goal system using the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) method.
Learners acquire the ability to optimize the AHP Consistency Ratio (CR) to 0.05 or lower using the Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) algorithm.
Learners can create an instructional design plan that reflects the top three weighted cognitive processes (reasoning 0.5723, recall 0.5276, discrimination 0.5192).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
